marketNews.title: AADI: ARA on Listing Day, PUPS Exercise Starts December 6
marketNews.content:
Adaro Andalan Indonesia ($AADI) officially listed on the IDX today, Thursday (5/12). Amidst the buzz regarding short-term trading opportunities from the AADI IPO, we assess that investors can also consider fundamental factors for long-term investment in AADI, especially from the dividend yield aspect. 
- Valuation Potentially Re-rated to 5-7x P/E We project AADI's net profit in FY25F to drop to 934 million USD (-27.5% YoY) due to the loss of one-off gain from subsidiary sales, with core profit only declining by -3.2% YoY. However, given its low IPO valuation (2.9x P/E FY25F), we see AADI having significant upside potential with a re-rating opportunity to 5x P/E FY25F (9,650 rupiah per share, +74% from the IPO price). We consider the AADI valuation at 5x P/E to be reasonable and conservative because it is lower than the 5-year historical average P/E of its parent company, Alamtri Resources Indonesia ($ADRO), at 6.9x P/E. This valuation is also between Bukit Asam ($PTBA) at 7.3x P/E FY25F and Indo Tambangraya Megah ($ITMG) at 4.8x P/E FY25F. If AADI can re-rate to ADRO's 5-year historical average P/E (6.9x) and become similar to PTBA's valuation at ~7x PE, this implies a price of 13,525 rupiah per share (+144% from the IPO price). 
- Dividend Yield up to ~17% with 50% DPR Assumption Besides the expectation that the Newcastle coal price outlook will not drop significantly, we see AADI's potential for re-rating will also be driven by the dividend prospect for the 2025 fiscal year, which we project can reach ~966 rupiah per share. This amount indicates a dividend yield of ~17% based on the AADI share price at IPO (5,550 rupiah per share). This dividend size assumes a dividend payout ratio (DPR) of 50%, which is the average DPR of ADRO in the last 3 years. This dividend yield is higher compared to other large coal companies, such as ITMG and PTBA. Although management stated in the prospectus that they plan to distribute dividends with a DPR of up to 45%, we assess that the assumption of a 50% DPR is not aggressive considering the company currently has no major capex plans in the near future. With a 50% DPR and the level of net profit generated by the company, we also believe AADI still has sufficient funds should it decide at any time to develop its 2 coal mines, namely Pari Coal and Ratah Coal. 
- Main Assumptions in Our Analysis
  - Average Newcastle coal price of 135 USD per ton in 2024 and 130 USD per ton in 2025, reflecting normalization from the current level of 134.8 USD per ton. 
  - Sales volume of 63 million tons in 2024 (-0.6% YoY) and 64 million tons in 2025 (+1.6% YoY). 
  - Cash costs of 56.2 USD per ton in 2024 (-12% YoY) and 57.8 USD per ton in 2025 (+2.9% YoY). 
  - Non-operational income significantly decreased in 2025 (-89.4% YoY) due to the loss of one-off gain from asset disposal. 

Key Takeaway
Although it seems many investors bought AADI based on short-term trading opportunities, we see AADI could be a good fundamental investment opportunity, especially with a relatively stable coal outlook and significant recurring dividend yield. Starting Friday (6/12) until Tuesday (10/12) at 10.00 AM Western Indonesia Time, investors entitled to exercise AADI PUPS ([$ADRO-H](-H)) can exercise on the Stockbit application. The dividend that can be used to exercise ADRO-H will be credited on Friday (6/12). 
With AADI increasing by +19.8% to the level of 6,650 rupiah per share today (5/12), the exercise price is 5,971 rupiah per share (including 0.18% transaction fees charged based on the PUPS prospectus). 

Here is how to exercise ADRO-H on Stockbit:
1. Swipe right on ADRO-H on the Portfolio page, then click Exercise. 
2. Enter the amount of ADRO-H you want to exercise. Then click Exercise.

tickerNews.title: BUMI Targets Coal Production of 80 Million Tons in 2025
tickerNews.content: $BUMI: [Kontan](https://investasi.kontan.co.id/news/bumi-resourcers-bumi-optimistis-produksi-batubara-capai-80-juta-ton-di-tahun-2025) reported that Bumi Resources targets a coal production volume of around 80 million tons during 2025, which is higher by +2.6-5.3% compared to the projected production volume during 2024 at 76-78 million tons. BUMI itself [recorded](https://emitten-announcement.stockbit.com/attachments/f-31805526-0_BUMI_Laporan_Informasi_dan_Fakta_Material_31805526_lamp2.pdf) a coal production volume of 57.3 million tons (+2% YoY) during 9M24, with a sales volume of 55.8 million tons (+2.8% YoY). In a separate occasion, BUMI also [plans](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202412/c628f14583_1392f4794d.pdf) to hold a private placement of approximately 16.1 million shares on December 11, 2024, to carry out a conversion of mandatory convertible bonds, although the implementation price has not been announced.

tickerNews.title: PANI States PIK 2 Property Development Continues Despite Tropical Coastland PSN Status Review
tickerNews.content: $PANI: The Corporate Secretary of Pantai Indah Kapuk Dua, Christy Grassela, [said](https://epaper.kontan.co.id/mobile/harian/2024/12/05) that the property development project in PIK 2 continues according to plan and is unaffected by the polemic surrounding the national strategic project (PSN) status of Tropical Coastland, which is part of the PIK 2 development plan. Previously, the Minister of Agrarian Affairs and Spatial Planning/Head of the National Land Agency, Nusron Wahid, stated that President Prabowo Subianto would review the determination of this PSN status. This week, the Secretary of the Coordinating Ministry for Economic Affairs, Susiwijono Moegiarso, [mentioned](https://snips.stockbit.com/snips-terbaru/-opec-akan-kembali-tunda-rencana-peningkatan-produksi#:~:text=Sekretaris%C2%A0Kementerian,hal%20tersebut.) that his office would facilitate discussions between the government and PANI to discuss this matter.

tickerNews.title: MEDC Plans Bond Issuance of IDR 2.5 Trillion for Refinancing and Debt Settlement
tickerNews.content: $MEDC: Medco Energi Internasional plans to issue bonds valued at 2.5 trillion rupiah, with the proceeds intended for refinancing previous bonds and settling part of a loan to a subsidiary. The bonds consist of Series A valued at approximately 1.7 trillion rupiah (7.75% coupon and 5-year tenor) and Series B valued at 825 billion rupiah (8.25% coupon and 7-year tenor). The public offering period is scheduled from December 27, 2024, to January 2, 2025. [These bonds](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202412/07a7819b07_72dc8f5497.pdf) have received an idAA- rating from Pefindo.

tickerNews.title: MTEL Gains 8,101 km of Fiber Optic Network Following Acquisition of PTPP's Subsidiary Assets
tickerNews.content: $MTEL: [Bisnis](https://market.bisnis.com/read/20241204/192/1821639/akuisisi-aset-ptpp-jaringan-fiber-optik-mitratel-mtel-bertambah-8101-km) reported that Dayamitra Telekomunikasi will acquire an additional fiber optic network of 8,101 km and a billable length of 12,524 km from the acquisition of PT Ultra Mandiri Telekomunikasi. Consequently, MTEL's total fiber optic network increases from 39,714 km to over 47,800 km. Previously, MTEL acquired 99.3% of the shares in PT Ultra Mandiri Telekomunikasi valued at approximately 645.5 billion rupiah, all of which was a divestment from PT PP ($PTPP). The President Director of MTEL, Theodorus Ardi Hartoko, stated that the company will continue to expand selectively, not only in the tower business but also in fiber optics and other supporting services.

tickerNews.title: SRAJ Announces $32 Million Equity Participation by BCCS Maverick (A) I LP and USD 125 Million Debt Purchase by Bain Capital Credit Affiliates
tickerNews.content: $SRAJ: Sejahteraraya Anugrahjaya [announced](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202412/7b0aaf2d09_412ee1ef67.pdf) that BCCS Maverick (A) I LP will take a stake worth 32 million USD in SRAJ's new share issuance. The purchase price has not been announced, while this transaction is part of a plan for a private placement of up to 1.2 billion (10%) shares approved at the Independent GMS in August 2024. Additionally, SRAJ also announced that BCSS Maverick Holdings I LP, BCSS Maverick Holdings II LP, and BCCS Maverick (A) I LP will purchase company debt with a principal amount of 125 million USD. These three entities are business entities owned by Bain Capital Credit LP, a US private investment firm.

tickerNews.title: DUTI to Distribute IDR 703 Billion Interim Dividend for 2024 Fiscal Year
tickerNews.content: $DUTI: Duta Pertiwi will [distribute](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202412/ac98509128_e92b470cc7.pdf) an interim dividend for the 2024 fiscal year amounting to 703 billion rupiah or 380 rupiah per share. The cum date in the regular and negotiation market is December 12, 2024, with payment on December 23, 2024. Referring to DUTI's share price on Thursday (5/12) at 4,400 rupiah per share, the indicative dividend yield is 8.6%.

tickerNews.title: HERO Shareholders Approve Name Change to DFI Retail Nusantara; Focus Shifts to Beauty/Health and Household Products
tickerNews.content: $HERO: Hero Supermarket shareholders on Wednesday (4/12) approved the change of the company's name to DFI Retail Nusantara. The President Director of HERO, Hadrianus Wahyu Trikusumo, [said](https://epaper.kontan.co.id/mobile/harian/2024/12/05) that the name change was carried out because HERO has divested the Hero Supermarket business segment to an affiliate, PT Hero Ritel Nusantara, at the end of June 2024. Moving forward, Hadrianus mentioned that HERO will focus on the beauty and health product retail segment through Guardian, and the household product segment through IKEA. Nevertheless, Hadrianus did not elaborate on the capex allocation or store addition targets for 2025. As of November 2024, HERO has 340 Guardian stores.

tickerNews.title: Fed Head Jerome Powell Signals Slower Pace of Rate Cuts as US Economy Proves Stronger Than Expected
tickerNews.content: The Head of the Fed, Jerome Powell, [said](https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/powell-remarks-watched-sign-pushback-or-support-fed-rate-cut-2024-12-04/) on Wednesday (4/12) that the US economy is currently stronger than his team's expectation when starting interest rate cuts in September 2024. Powell also mentioned that current US economic conditions make the Fed slightly more cautious in finding the neutral interest rate level, which is a signal that the Fed is likely to slow down the pace of rate cuts going forward.

tickerNews.title: President Prabowo Subianto Received Threats that IHSG would Fall if Free Nutrition Program Continued, States He is Unbothered Because He Owns No Shares
tickerNews.content: President Prabowo Subianto on Wednesday (4/12) [said](https://epaper.kontan.co.id/mobile/harian/2024/12/05) that he received a threat that the IHSG would fall if he continued the free nutrition program, although he did not specify who gave the threat. President Prabowo also stated that he did not mind the threat because he did not own any shares.

tickerNews.title: BEI to Implement Non-cancellation Period During Pre-opening and Pre-closing Trading Sessions Starting 2025
tickerNews.content: The Director of the Indonesia Stock Exchange (BEI), Irvan Susandy, [said](https://epaper.bisnis.com/epaper/detail/page/147984/) that the exchange will implement a non-cancellation period during the pre-opening and pre-closing trading sessions for stocks. This policy will come into effect starting in 2025, although Irvan did not specify the exact date. The non-cancellation period is a period where investors cannot cancel or change open orders, but can still enter new orders. This step is intended to minimize price manipulation and order book spoofing during the pre-opening and pre-closing stock trading sessions.

tickerNews.title: Bitcoin Price Surpasses USD 100,000 for the First Time, Reaching All-Time High
tickerNews.content: The price of Bitcoin exceeded 100,000 USD for the first time on Thursday (5/12), marking an all-time high level. The Bitcoin price has surged in [recent weeks](https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2024/dec/04/bitcoin-share-price-100-thousand), driven by market expectations that the US President-elect, Donald Trump, will implement looser regulations and policies supporting crypto assets.

tickerNews.title: Finance Minister Releases Regulation Allowing Budget Surplus as Loan Source for State-Owned Entities and Others Under Government Mandate
tickerNews.content: The Minister of Finance, Sri Mulyani, released [Finance Minister Regulation No. 88/2024](https://epaper.kontan.co.id/mobile/harian/2024/12/05) which allows budget balances exceeding the State Budget (APBN) to be a source of loans for State-Owned Enterprises (BUMN), Regionally-Owned Enterprises (BUMD), local governments, and other legal entities assigned by the government. These loans can only have a maximum duration of 90 calendar days and are intended to support debtor liquidity. Later, the loans provided will use the Rupiah currency and are uncommitted credit lines. In response to this new regulation, an economist from the Bright Institute, Awalil Rizky, stated that the ease of this loan facility has the potential to cause misuse by bureaucratic elements, so the government needs to create reports related to internal control systems.

tickerNews.title: Freeport Indonesia Targets Copper Smelter at JIIPE to Increase Operations in 3Q25 After October Fire
tickerNews.content: Spokesperson for PT Freeport Indonesia, Katri Krisnati, [said](https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/mind-id-says-freeport-indonesias-smelter-be-fixed-within-6-months-2024-12-04/) on Wednesday (4/12) that they target the operation of the copper smelter at JIIPE, East Java, to start increasing in 3Q25 after stopping due to a fire in October 2024. In a separate occasion, the President Director of MIND ID, Hendi Prio Santoso, said on Wednesday (4/12) that they hope the smelter can operate normally within the next 6 months. Operational problems at the smelter facility prompted PT Freeport Indonesia to request the government to extend its copper concentrate export license, which expires at the end of this year.

tickerNews.title: BJBR Plans IDR 1 Trillion Bond Issuance with Maturities of 3 and 5 Years
tickerNews.content: Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat dan Banten ($BJBR) plans to issue bonds worth 1 trillion rupiah, with the proceeds intended for financing disbursement. The bonds consist of Series A valued at 200 billion rupiah (7% coupon and 3-year tenor) and Series B valued at 800 billion rupiah (7.3% coupon and 5-year tenor). The public offering period is scheduled for December 3-5, 2024. [These bonds](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202412/43d54198c6_178da239a5.pdf) have received an idAA rating from Pefindo.

tickerNews.title: BNBR Plans Private Placement of ~13.4 Billion Shares on December 10 for Mandatory Convertible Bond Conversion Taken by Non-Affiliates
tickerNews.content: Bakrie & Brothers ($BNBR) [plans](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202412/50b2438e99_9e484b744e.pdf) to hold a private placement of approximately 13.4 billion shares at a price of 64 rupiah per share on December 10, 2024, to execute the conversion of mandatory convertible bonds. All new shares will be taken by Eurofa Capital Investment Inc. and Silvery Moon Investment Ltd., which are not affiliated parties of the company.
